channel.title: emacs on Vedang Manerikar
channel.description: Recent content in emacs on Vedang Manerikar

item.title: Compiling and Running Emacs 28 from the native-comp feature branch (Ubuntu 20.04).
item.description: The gist of it, building Emacs from Source git clone https://git.savannah.gnu.org/git/emacs.git cd emacs ./autogen.sh ./configure --with-nativecomp # If everything works make # Test the binary src/emacs -Q # Install the binary sudo make install # If you want to re-build from scratch make distclean Problems during Installation Configure fails because libgccjit fails the smoketest Ensure that libgccjit is installed and at the latest version (at this point in time, the latest version is 10)
